alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 9:03PM MDT until May 09 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LARAMIE COUNTY... At 903 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of North Cheyenne, or 11 miles northwest of Cheyenne, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Warren AFB, Frontier Park and Ranchettes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 2 and 24. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 352 and 361. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
